attributes.title: Do not download!
attributes.review: This app takes the longest time to download and it takes a bunch of your storage space. Honestly horrible app it glitches and when I open another app it opens back up to this one. I so do not recommend this app at all.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: Downloading this app took days on end and it made my phone malfunction. I had to buy a new phone because of this. Not only that but I thought this app was about oranges and not an orange man. It was so scary. The app is filled with rats, rotting trash, and severed baby heads! I hope no one ever downloads this app again.

attributes.title: Absolutely Awful
attributes.review: i got this app for one reason, and one reason only. i was promised that this App would Create A ritual circle in my home that, with the Blood of a racist would summon an eldritch being. this was false advertising. i am quite disappointed in fact.

attributes.title: Absolute Garbage
attributes.review: The app forces me to sign up, allow notifications, and provide my phone number before I can even access the information. Plus it keeps on crashing! 0/10 would not recommend.
